member.name: T:ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationManager
member.summary: An easy way to let user configure how a plugin behaves without the need to make your own GUI. The user can change any of the settings you expose, even keyboard shortcuts. https://github.com/ManlyMarco/BepInEx.ConfigurationManager

member.summary: GUID of this plugin

member.summary: Version constant

member.summary: Event fired every time the manager window is shown or hidden.

member.summary: Is the config manager main window displayed on screen

member.name: M:ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationManager.RegisterCustomSettingDrawer(System.Type,System.Action{ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase})
member.summary: Register a custom setting drawer for a given type. The action is ran in OnGui in a single setting slot. Do not use any Begin / End layout methods, and avoid raising height from standard.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationManager.SearchString
member.summary: String currently entered into the search box

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.LegacySettingEntry.Wrapper
member.summary: Instance of the object that holds this setting. Null if setting is not in a ConfigWrapper.

member.name: T:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase
member.summary: Class representing all data about a setting collected by ConfigurationManager.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.AcceptableValues
member.summary: List of values this setting can take

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.AcceptableValueRange
member.summary: Range of the values this setting can take

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.ShowRangeAsPercent
member.summary: Should the setting be shown as a percentage (only applies to value range settings)

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.CustomDrawer
member.summary: Custom setting draw action

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Browsable
member.summary: Show this setting in the settings screen at all? If false, don't show.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Category
member.summary: Category the setting is under. Null to be directly under the plugin.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.DefaultValue
member.summary: If set, a "Default" button will be shown next to the setting to allow resetting to default.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.HideDefaultButton
member.summary: Force the "Reset" button to not be displayed, even if a valid DefaultValue is available.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Description
member.summary: Optional description shown when hovering over the setting

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.DispName
member.summary: Name of the setting

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.PluginInfo
member.summary: Plugin this setting belongs to

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.ReadOnly
member.summary: Only allow showing of the value. False whenever possible by default.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.SettingType
member.summary: Type of the variable

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.PluginInstance
member.summary: Instance of the plugin that owns this setting

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.IsAdvanced
member.summary: Is this setting advanced

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Order
member.summary: Order of the setting on the settings list relative to other settings in a category. 0 by default, lower is higher on the list.

member.summary: Get the value of this setting

member.summary: Set the value of this setting

member.name: T:BepInEx.AcceptableValueListAttribute
member.summary: Specify the list of acceptable values for this variable. It will allow the configuration window to show a list of available values.

member.name: M:BepInEx.AcceptableValueListAttribute.#ctor(System.Object[])
member.summary: Specify the list of acceptable values for this variable. It will allow the configuration window to show a list of available values.
member.param: List of acceptable values for this setting

member.name: M:BepInEx.AcceptableValueListAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Specify a method that returns the list of acceptable values for this variable. It will allow the configuration window to show a list of available values.
member.param: Name of an instance method that takes no arguments and returns array object[] that contains the acceptable values

member.name: T:BepInEx.AcceptableValueRangeAttribute
member.summary: Specify the range of acceptable values for this variable. It will allow the configuration window to show a slider and filter inputs.

member.name: M:BepInEx.AcceptableValueRangeAttribute.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.param: Show the current value as % between min and max values if possible. Otherwise show the value itself.

member.name: M:BepInEx.CustomSettingDrawAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Register a custom field editor drawer that will replace config manager's default field editors (The part between setting name and the default button).
member.param: Name of the method that will draw the edit field. The method needs to be an instance method with signature void Name (). Runs in OnGUI.

member.name: T:BepInEx.KeyboardShortcut
member.summary: A keyboard shortcut that can be used in Update method to check if user presses a key combo. Use SavedKeyboardShortcut to allow user to change this shortcut and have the changes saved. How to use: Use IsDown instead of the Imput.GetKeyDown in the Update loop.

member.name: M:BepInEx.KeyboardShortcut.#ctor(UnityEngine.KeyCode,UnityEngine.KeyCode[])
member.summary: Create a new keyboard shortcut.
member.param: Keys that should be held down before main key is registered

member.name: M:BepInEx.KeyboardShortcut.IsDown
member.summary: Check if the main key was just pressed (Input.GetKeyDown), and specified modifier keys are all pressed

member.name: M:BepInEx.KeyboardShortcut.IsPressed
member.summary: Check if the main key is currently held down (Input.GetKey), and specified modifier keys are all pressed

member.name: M:BepInEx.KeyboardShortcut.IsUp
member.summary: Check if the main key was just lifted (Input.GetKeyUp), and specified modifier keys are all pressed.

member.name: T:BepInEx.SavedKeyboardShortcut
member.summary: A keyboard shortcut that is saved in the config file and can be changed by the user if ConfigurationManager plugin is present. How to use: Run IsPressed in Update to check if user presses the button combo.

member.name: M:BepInEx.SavedKeyboardShortcut.IsPressed
member.summary: Check if the main key is currently held down (Input.GetKey), and specified modifier keys are all pressed

member.name: M:BepInEx.SavedKeyboardShortcut.IsDown
member.summary: Check if the main key was just pressed (Input.GetKeyDown), and specified modifier keys are all pressed

member.name: M:BepInEx.SavedKeyboardShortcut.IsUp
member.summary: Check if the main key was just lifted (Input.GetKeyUp), and specified modifier keys are all pressed.
